venue.name: Boston Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa

item.description:
Hosted by: DockDogs WorldWide | DockDogs Nationals

Event Format
Outdoor Big Air–, Extreme Vertical™ & Speed Retrieve™

On-Site Registration Entry Fees
$30.00 / team per Big Air, Speed Retrieve Wave, or Extreme Vertical Competition (Limited to a total of 40 dogs per Big Air, 40 dogs for Speed Retrieve Waves, 28 dogs for Extreme Vertical), $30.00 for Iron Dog

Event Schedule
Saturday June 16, 2012

Onsite Registration/Practice – 10:00 am
Big Air WAVE # 1 – 11:00 am
Big Air WAVE # 2 – 12:30 pm
Big Air WAVE # 3 - 2:00pm
Big Air WAVE # 4 - 3:30pm
Extreme Vertical – 5:30 pm

Sunday June 17, 2012

Onsite Registration/Practice – 10:00 am
Speed Retrieve - 11:00am
Big Air WAVE # 5 – 12:30 pm
Big Air WAVE # 6 – 2:30 pm
Speed Retrieve Finals - 5:00pm
Big Air Finals (Pro, Semi-Pro, & Amateur Finals) Begin at 5:30 pm

From Boston Red Dog: "The weather for Saturday and Sunday looks pretty sunny! Don't forget that our parking lot will be blocked off for the event. Parking will be available across the street at Slade Gordon, next to Slade Gordon, on Southampton Street towards Mass Ave., and next to the new Citgo gas station on Southampton. (Ps don't forget there is large parking lot across the street at the South Bay mall also!)"

*Dock Diving is a fast-growing sport in which dogs compete against each other jumping off a 40 foot dock into a pool/lake for distance, height, and retrieving skills! This is a total spectator sport and tons of fun for all!*
item.name: Dock Dogs Competition at the Boston Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa!
